# `/reload` Command
Reloads all function and script files from all behavior packs.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Game Directors</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### Reload
`/reload`

Reload all function and script files.
